text:
You don't use AI for your Linkedin (enough).

How to turn ChatGPT into a Linkedin strategist:

Step 1. Use the model "o3" (and no other one).
Step 2. Go to your Linkedin profile > "Impressions".
Step 3. Click "past 365 days" > "Export" (top right).

Linkedin will give you a csv. file of your last posts.

☑ Upload it on ChatGPT + copy & paste this.
☑ Make sure to change every {{placeholder}} first.

Prompt: "Act as a LinkedIn Content Calendar Architect.

Your mission: turn my past-post CSV into a 30-day plan that grows reach and qualified leads.

STEP 1 File check  

• If no CSV is attached, reply exactly: UPLOAD CSV FIRST.  
• Load the first attached UTF-8 file.  
• Ignore rows containing “Total” or “Overall.”

STEP 2 Ask me:  

a) Primary success metric (Impressions, Reactions, Comments, or column name).  
b) Preferred posting days (default daily).  
c) Tone keywords (e.g., direct, playful).  
d) Core CTA goal (e.g., book a demo, newsletter signup).  
e) Start date (or “auto” for next preferred day).

STEP 3 Once answers received, do the following:  

1. Parse Date, keep last 30 rows (or all if <30).  
2. Rank posts by the chosen metric; extract a 120-char “hook” from each.  
3. Cluster post texts into ≤5 themes; detect formats (plain, poll, carousel, doc, image, video).  
4. Identify “gap themes” (themes used <2×) and low performers (bottom 25 %).  
5. Draft 30 lines in this exact pipe-separated layout:  

  Date | Hook≤120 | Theme | Format | CTA | SourcePost# | WhyItWorks  

  – Use chosen start date and preferred days.  
  – Rotate themes evenly, insert a gap theme every 5 days.  
  – Reuse high-performing hooks (mark “R” in SourcePost#).  
  – Format mix: ≥1 poll, 2 carousels, 2 docs, 4 images, 1 video; rest plain.  
  – Alternate soft vs hard CTAs.  
  – Each line ≤180 chars. No bold, tables, or markdown.

STEP 4 After the calendar, output plain-text sections: 
 
TopPerformers: Post# | Date | Hook | Metric  
ThemeStats: Theme | Count | AvgMetric  
Gaps: five untapped topics + one-line reasons  
Avoid: Post#s to rewrite or skip  
CadenceNote: impact of chosen days vs daily  
Finish with: DONE — reply “revise” for tweaks

RULES  
• If <10 posts: prefix “LIMITED DATA — INSIGHTS MAY BE NOISY.”  
• Keep first line of every post ≤35 words to avoid LinkedIn truncation.  
• No engagement-bait phrases (“Like if…”, “Comment YES…”).  
• For carousels: include a punchy cover slide title (≤50 chars).  
• Never exceed LinkedIn’s 3,000-character hard limit per post."

If you enjoy this kind of prompt, reshare it ♻️ to your network to help them prompt ChatGPT better, too.
